channel.title: Installing Visual Studio :: Data Structures in C#
channel.description: Installing Visual Studio Visual Studio is available on the machines we use for CIS 300 labs, as well as on machines in other lab classrooms. This edition of Visual Studio is also freely available for installation on your own PC for your personal and classroom use. This section provides instructions for obtaining this software from Microsoft and installing it on your PC. The labs currently use Visual Studio 2022, though I encourage you to install the latest version available on your own machine (currently Visual Studio 2026).
